value.title: Deploy WordPress with Azure Database for MariaDB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy WordPress backed by Azure Database for MariaDB. It is the latest addition to the open source database services available on the Azure platform and further strengthens Azure's commitment to open source and its communities. The service offers built-in high availability, automatic backups,

value.title: How to partition your data in Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Carey MacDonald stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about Azure Cosmos DB, a managed database service with unlimited horizontal scale, allowing you to scale storage and throughput independently. value.title: How to use composite indexes and correlated subqueries with Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Tim Sander joins Scott Hanselman to discuss composite indexes and correlated subqueries using the SQL API in Azure Cosmos DB. value.title: How to use Jupyter Notebook and Apache Spark in Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kirill Gavrylyuk joins Scott Hanselman to show how to run Jupyter Notebook and Apache Spark in Azure Cosmos DB. value.title: How to use the Gremlin API with Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jayanta Mondal stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about Gremlin, the traversal query language for Cosmos DB graph.
